message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.ST, cs.NA 

The paper proposes a method for nonparametric regression using sparse additive models with shape constraints such as convexity/concavity. This involves developing a regularization functional to avoid overfitting and reduce model complexity. The paper also presents an efficient backfitting algorithm with linear per-iteration complexity. Given these aspects, the paper is likely to belong to the following arXiv CS sub-categories: 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning)
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence)
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms)
- cs.ST (Statistics)
- cs.NA (Numerical Analysis)
